on reading compounds: 溢乳【イツニュウ】galactorrhea, lactorrhea, regurgitation of milk
活気横溢【カッキオウイツ】being full of vitality (energy), in exuberant spirits, effervescent, ebullient
kun reading compounds: 零れる【こぼれる】to spill, to fall out of, to overflow, to peek through, to become visible (although normally not), to escape (of a smile, tear, etc.)
溢れる【あふれる】to overflow, to brim over, to flood
